name: hissed
content:

past simple and past participle of
hiss
[ I ] to make a noise like a long s sound: Why do snakes hiss? The iron was hissing and spluttering. People in the audience were hissing their disapproval.
[ T ] to say something in a quiet angry way: "Shut up, Tom!" she hissed.
